post.body: Has this happened to you guys?
post.title: So, I was just randomly fishing in my survival world. I reeled in two new Infinity bows. I don't know if this is legit or the game is bugging lol.

body: The mobs are insane on bedrock, mostly due to bugs. Constant ghast spawning. Invisible dragon's breath that can easily kill you with full protection iv diamond armor. Magma cubes that hit so hard.
body_html: The mobs are insane on bedrock, mostly due to bugs. Constant ghast spawning. Invisible dragon's breath that can easily kill you with full protection iv diamond armor. Magma cubes that hit so hard.
